doc.previous: The geometric interpretation of De Casteljau s algorithm is straightforward  which we evaluate individually using De Casteljau s algorithm
doc.after: The following picture shows this process for a cubic B zier curve   Note that the intermediate points that were constructed are in fact the control points for two new B zier curves both exactly coincident with the old one This algorithm not only evaluates the curve at but splits the curve into two pieces at and provides the equations of the two sub curves in B zier form
